overview: Australian jazz guitarist Frank Gambale offers a combination concert and private guitar lesson in this unique program, first playing new material for a live audience, then inviting you into an exclusive session where he demonstrates his licks. Songs in the live segment include "Bad Intent," "Dangerous Curves" and more. The step-by-step instructions in the lesson portion are designed to let you tackle then his techniques at your own pace.
title: Frank Gambale: Concert with Class
